DOC.brief_summary: A barrier initiate progestin contraceptive early postpartum period concern interference breastfeeding , specifically lactogenesis . In trial , investigator aim add safety data effect immediate insertion contraceptive implant breastfeeding . The investigator seek examine time lactogenesis immediate post-delivery insertion delivery room versus insertion contraceptive implant postpartum ward prior medical discharge . For study , 82 consent woman randomize immediate implant insertion ( 0-2 hour follow delivery ) delivery room insertion implant follow delivery postpartum room prior medical discharge ( 24-48 hour follow delivery ) .
DOC.brief_title: Labor Delivery Implant Insertion : A Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.criteria: Healthy pregnant woman Age 18 Intend breastfeed Desire contraceptive implant method contraception Agree randomize delivery room vs. postpartum ward insertion Have deliver healthy term infant ( 37 week gestation ) History pituitary adenoma History pituitary surgery Contraindication implant insertion history breast cancer Hypersensitivity component contraceptive implant , Nexplanon Hemorrhage require transfusion Diagnosis chorioamnionitis Diagnosis severe pregnancy induce hypertension Diagnosis coagulopathy , liver disease , undiagnosed genital bleed Prolonged postpartum hospitalization Taking follow medication inducer hepatic enzyme : carbamazepine , enzalutamide , fosphenytoin , Lumacaftor , mitotane , phenobarbital , phenytoin , primidone , rifabutin , rifampin , rifapentine , bexarotene , bosentan , dabrafenib , dexamethasone , efavirenz , eslicarbazepine , etravirine , modafinil , nafcillin , St. Johns wort .
